Pre-Game Insights: With both teams eyeing 2 points from this match, this match has the ingredients of being a thriller.
India will take on South Africa in a crunch Group 2 encounter at the Perth Stadium on Sunday.
A defeat would extend their wait for a guaranteed spot in the semis.
Others: Virat Kohli has not been dismissed in the competition, making him a great contender to be a captain or a vice-captain.
Suryakumar Yadav and Rohit Sharma look like the other sure-shot selections from among the India batters.
Rilee Rossouw and David Miller can be considered among the batters from the Proteas.
Quinton de Kock (South Africa) and Dinesh Karthik (India) can be given a chance in the Fantasy XI as keepers.
Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel and R Ashwin from India while Wayne Parnell and Aiden Markram from the Proteas can be picked as all-rounders.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Arshdeep Singh, Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada are the bowling options who can be considered for this match.
